post.title: i18n for web apps
post.author: finishearly
post.excerpt: Making i18n work for a .net back and webpack front end.
post.content:
Yesterday I published a Webpack plugin on NPM that helps me make working with i18n much more streamlined and simple.

I'll blog about it more here soon but for the time being, if you are using Webpack, check out the plugin and let me know what you think.
